name: Cafe En Infierno (Coffee in Hell)
description:
You're Stampy 480 and you stamp "Toy" on packages as they pass by you under the watchful eye (and screaming mouth) of The Voice. It's all for Company; Company is all. Will you change your situation or continue to slowly pluck away at your overwhelming debt?

Created by Derek LaPorte

Controls are: Spacebar for stamp, D or Right Arrow to move
